text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.

After having created a very large skeleton site in site tree, page by tedious page, it would be great if I could just import an xls/csv site map with relative path, page title, template, etc (basically all the things needed to create a blank page in the site tree) (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Import-Site-Map-into-Site-Tree-CMS/idi-p/696286#M123614>)
Hello! Does any one have any ideas for building out a page to display our software documentation? Preferably something easy to navigate with a left-hand side bar with expandable submenus.
